#summary This page is a stub entry point for ZomadiCAM documentation

= Introduction =

ZomadiCAM is a SketchUp to Shopbot Partfile generator.


= Details =

Load the Zomadic plugins into the Google Sketchup plugins folder.

Be sure you are on a PC and have created C:\SbParts\

Launch Sketchup and menu select 3D-Warehouse->Get Models...

Search for ZomadiCAM and download the Virtual Shopbot directly into your model.

You *must* explode the Virtual Shopbot Model *one* time. This step will be soon deprecated.

Download another model from the 3D-Warehouse::ZomadiCAM Collection.

Select the model and menu select Plugins::Zomadic Tools::ZomadiCAM::Transform Model directly to Partfile.

The Shopbot Partfile for the model should have been written into the C:\SbParts\ folder.
